title: Catoctin Mountain Park: Nearby Attractions
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Nearby Attractions            Nearby Attractions      National Park Service Areas:   Antietam National Battlefield 26 miles   Chesapeake & Ohio Canal National Historical Park 28 miles  Eisenhower National Historic Site 20  miles  Gettysburg National Military Park 20 miles  Harpers Ferry National Historical Park 37 miles  Monocacy National Battlefield  18 miles  Appalachian National Scenic Trail  Potomac Heritage National Scenic Trail  Other Attractions:   Catoctin Wildlife Preserve and Zoo  Cunningham Falls State Park  Tourism Council of Frederick County  Washington County Hagerstown, MD  Monocacy & Catoctin Watershed Alliance
